entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain except snow inland and over higher terrain. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm except snowfall amount 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snow inland and over higher terrain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 06 March 2023
